Description
Lusha is growing and we are searching for an experienced Product Marketing Manager to join our team!
If you are a skilled marketing professional who is motivated by customer insights, excited about product launches, passionate about the user journey, and thrives in a cross-functional, fast-paced environment - read on!
As a PMM, you will focus on launching new products and features, and develop product positioning and messaging that hits every stage of the funnel.
You will:
Tell stories about how our products work and drive value for our users and customers.
Create sales enablement collateral and content that helps onboard & guide our users.
Develop go-to-market strategy plans and execute launches across web, social, email, ads etc.
Own the lifecycle from awareness to advocacy to develop messaging that helps differentiate Lusha.
Manage and prioritize a workload of multiple projects with a variety of stakeholders.
You are:
A storyteller. You have deep empathy for users and are able to adapt how you communicate to best engage your audience. You have excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Data-oriented. You like working with data and insights and pair that with your passion for users to generate balanced and thoughtful points of view for how to take our products to market.
Organized. You are able to manage highly interdependent, multifaceted projects and keep various work streams on track - even those with many moving parts.
A self-starter. You know how to identify opportunities and take initiative.
Passionate about technology. You are keen to learn about how things work and are able to explain technical concepts in ways that everyday people can understand.
Ambitious. You are eager to make an impact. You thrive in a fast-moving, dynamic, growth environment and are able to operate at the strategic level and the micro-detail to get things right.
